ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Chant of Flame and Frost
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I m pretty sure the Chant of Flame checks against Heat resist because after a few explores into Solusek, the goblins down there seem to be immune to it
ygData.messageBody:
Well I'm pretty sure the Chant of Flame checks against Heat resist
because after a few explores into Solusek, the goblins down there seem
to be immune to it and resist every time.

Although what with resists against songs being as bad as they are, you
can never tell ... I really do get tired of how resisted my chains
song is *sigh*

--
Melaniel, Wood Elf Bard (44)
Expert bard, novice brewer, hardened drinker and terrific flirt!

Mith Marr server

On Fri, 16 Jun 2000 15:30:09 -1000, "Reece, Tom CPT- 25IDL G4"
<g4mntofcr@...> wrote:

>Do these two songs check against the mob's fire/cold resist rates or the
>mob's magic resist rate? IIRC, someone posted a while back that every bard
>song that affects a mob checks against the mob's magic resist rate. But to
>me it would seem to make more sense that these two songs are exceptions and
>use the mob's fire/cold resist rate. Can somebody confirm what the correct
>answer is?
>
>Thanks
>Galtin of E'ci
